title: Hextech and store broken?
body:
Both my store and my hextech are crashing along with my chat. HELP? Screenshots attached. Anyone else with this issue?

[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/rrppmq.png[/IMG]

IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2q2fz4n.png[/IMG]

replies.body: Some features like chat were down due to a serer issue last night, per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything is okay now!
OMG I got a riot comment? <3 First time. I love you man. XD Yeah, everything is normal now. :) Thanks!
There is a chat issue affecting NA servers. You can check for updates on the client/launcher signified by a /!\ sign or here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ).
